vote.title: Authorize a five-year master agreement for the purchase of veterinary pharmaceuticals and medical supplies for the Department of Dallas Animal Services - MWI Veterinary Supply Co. dba MWI Animal Health in the estimated amount of $8,702,076.88, IDEXX Distribution, Inc. in the estimated amount of $2,282,265.96, Dechra Veterinary Products, LLC in the estimated amount of $1,588,570.11, and Merck Animal Health in the estimated amount of $883,488.76, lowest responsible bidders of five - Total estimated amount of $13,456,401.71 - Financing:  General Fund
vote.description: Authorize a five-year master agreement for the purchase of veterinary pharmaceuticals and medical supplies for the Department of Dallas Animal Services - MWI Veterinary Supply Co. dba MWI Animal Health in the estimated amount of $8,702,076.88, IDEXX Distribution, Inc. in the estimated amount of $2,282,265.96, Dechra Veterinary Products, LLC in the estimated amount of $1,588,570.11, and Merck Animal Health in the estimated amount of $883,488.76, lowest responsible bidders of five - Total estimated amount of $13,456,401.71 - Financing:  General Fund
